maki.title: Spicy Tuna Maki
maki.description: A tantalizing blend of spicy tuna, cucumber, and avocado, harmoniously rolled in nori and seasoned rice.

maki.title: Mango Maki
maki.description: Tempura-fried shrimp, cucumber, and cream cheese embrace a center of fresh avocado, delivering a satisfying contrast of textures.

maki.title: Salmon Maki
maki.description: Shiitake mushrooms, avocado, and pickled daikon radish nestle within a roll of seasoned rice, coated with nutty sesame seeds.

maki.title: Tuna Maki
maki.description: A vibrant assortment of julienned carrots, bell peppers, and cucumber, tightly encased in a nori-wrapped rice roll.

uramaki.title: Volcano Delight
uramaki.description: Creamy crab salad, avocado, and cucumber rolled inside, topped with spicy tuna and drizzled with fiery sriracha sauce.

uramaki.title: Rainbow Fusion
uramaki.description: A colorful blend of fresh tuna, salmon, yellowtail, and avocado, enveloping a core of cucumber and crab stick.

uramaki.title: Dragon Elegance
uramaki.description: Grilled eel and avocado nestled within the roll, draped with slices of ripe avocado resembling dragon scales.

uramaki.title: Sunset Serenity
uramaki.description: Tempura shrimp, cucumber, and spicy mayo embraced by a roll of soy paper, crowned with slices of creamy mango.

uramaki.title: Mystic Garden
uramaki.description: Shiitake mushrooms, asparagus, and cucumber intermingle with crispy tempura bits, blanketed by a layer of sesame seeds.

uramaki.title: Ocean Breeze
uramaki.description: A medley of fresh shrimp, crab stick, and avocado, laced with a gentle touch of zesty yuzu-infused tobiko.

uramaki.title: Tokyo Blossom
uramaki.description: Delicate pink soy paper envelopes a blend of tuna, crab stick, and cucumber, embellished with edible flower petals.

special.title: Sunrise Bliss
special.description: A delicate combination of fresh salmon, cream cheese, and asparagus, rolled in orange-hued tobiko for a burst of sunrise-inspired flavors.

special.title: Mango Tango Fusion
special.description: Tempura shrimp, cucumber, and avocado dance alongside sweet mango slices, drizzled with a tangy mango sauce.

special.title: Truffle Indulgence
special.description: Decadent slices of black truffle grace a roll of succulent wagyu beef, cucumber, and microgreens, culminating in an exquisite umami symphony.

special.title: Pacific Firecracker
special.description: Spicy crab salad, tempura shrimp, and jalape√±o peppers combine in a fiery ensemble, accented with a chili-infused aioli.

special.title: Eternal Eel Enchantment
special.description: An enchanting blend of eel tempura, foie gras, and cucumber, elegantly layered with truffle oil and gold leaf for a touch of opulence.
